items.sentence: I'm sure that Tom is just hungry as the rest of us are.
I can't play the tin whistle as well as I wish I could.
How many countries make up what's called Latin America?
Love for your parents is the foundation of all virtues.
Tom didn't even have enough money to buy one hamburger.
Is there any indication whether Tom wants to go or not?
Let's not forget that people say this house is haunted.
Let's not forget that what we'll be doing is dangerous.
Tom used a thermal camera to detect leaks in the walls.
Tom knew how to make Mary forget that she was homesick.
